v1.0.0.description:
Initial release of the K-On! After School Live!! APWorld.
For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/k-on_archipelago/blob/main/docs/setup.md)
v1.0.0.title: K-On! After School Live!! Archipelago v1.0.0

v1.0.1.description:
Fixes some problems found in the initial release.

- Fixed an issue where the client was unable to communicate with PPSSPP for some users.
- Fixed an issue where unlocked songs were not updating correctly for some users.
- Removed an unused item with a conflicting ID.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/k-on_archipelago/blob/main/docs/setup.md)
v1.0.1.title: K-On! After School Live!! Archipelago v1.0.1

v1.0.2.description:
- Fixed an issue where Full Band Clear checks weren't sending if playing on Hard difficulty.
- You can now play your Goal Song on Hard difficulty.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/k-on_archipelago/blob/main/docs/setup.md)
v1.0.2.title: K-On! After School Live!! Archipelago v1.0.2

v1.0.3.description:
- Added Hard Difficulty shuffle. If enabled, you must obtain the Hard Difficulty item before you can play songs in Hard Difficulty mode.
- Added DeathLink compatibility. If you get a Game Over during a song, you'll send a DeathLink! If you receive a DeathLink from another player while playing a song, you'll instantly Game Over.
- Fixed an issue where the Secret Score item didn't persist for the entire song (as it should) when used.
- Adjusted the method in which deaths are triggered when selecting locked characters in order to prevent potential game freezes.
- Adjusted the way that Snack items are received in order to prevent "lost" items.
- Reclassified Teatime Token items as `progression_skip_balancing`.
- Adjusted event logic rules for events that rely on Snack items.

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/k-on_archipelago/blob/main/docs/setup.md)
v1.0.3.title: K-On! After School Live!! Archipelago v1.0.3

v1.1.0.description:
- Implemented YAML-less Universal Tracker support
- Implemented DataStorage to log used items and song clears, fixing issues with snacks and preventing location collects from triggering Full Band Clear checks
- Added themed DeathLink messages
- Adjusted minimum for starting_songs_amount option to ensure you always start with at least one song
- Reduced the number of in-game reward popups triggered after completing a song with Hard Difficulty shuffle enabled
- Reduced frequency of client messages during initial connection 
- Fixed minor logic oversights

For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/k-on_archipelago/blob/main/docs/setup.md)
v1.1.0.title: K-On! After School Live!! Archipelago v1.1.0

v1.1.1.description:
- You can now play the Matching Outfits goal standalone without Cassette Tapes or Teatime Tokens being required
- Playing with the Matching Outfits goal will now only put one complete outfit set into the item pool (marked as Progression) with every other outfit set being incomplete (marked as Filler)
- Tutorial locations are no longer forced and are now only enabled if Event locations are turned on
- Rewrote generation code to eliminate failed generations 
- Reformatted death link messages
 
For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/k-on_archipelago/blob/main/docs/setup.md)
v1.1.1.title: K-On! After School Live!! Archipelago v1.1.1

v1.1.2.description:
- Adds the Manifest file required for Archipelago 0.7.0 support.
 
For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/k-on_archipelago/blob/main/docs/setup.md)
v1.1.2.title: K-On! After School Live!! Archipelago v1.1.2

v1.1.3.description:
- Adds item groups for characters and songs you can use when hinting.
 
For instructions, see the [Setup Guide.](https://github.com/dannybonz/k-on_archipelago/blob/main/docs/setup.md)
v1.1.3.title: K-On! After School Live!! Archipelago v1.1.3
